remarks: Lemma for ~ 1259prm .  Calculate a power mod.  In decimal, we calculate ` 2 ^ 3 0 6 = ( 2 ^ 7 6 ) ^ 4 x. 4 == 5 ^ 4 x. 4 = 2 N - 1 8 ` , ` 2 ^ 6 1 2 = ( 2 ^ 3 0 6 ) ^ 2 == 1 8 ^ 2 = 3 2 4 ` , ` 2 ^ 6 2 9 = 2 ^ 6 1 2 x. 2 ^ 1 7 == 3 2 4 x. 1 3 6 = 3 5 N - 1 ` and finally ` 2 ^ ( N - 1 ) = ( 2 ^ 6 2 9 ) ^ 2 == 1 ^ 2 = 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2015.)
